issue.title: Add the ability to include a XSL for export
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

We could add the ability for EasySDI to add in the catalog options an XSL used during the XML export of a metadata.

This will permit to remove the : <sdi:platform> part in the metadata exported.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

The XSL file definition will be attached to a resource type
